title: New York-based Comedian Releases New Album
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Bada has announced the release of Luck And Laughs
BROOKLYN, NEW YORK, OCTOBER 13, 2015 - Bada has announced the official release of his first studio recorded album, Luck And Laughs .
Brooklyn-based comedian Bada has been making people laugh since he launched BadaCast and According to Bada , a podcast series that offers a witty, New York-born perspective on a range of topics. Not afraid to talk about controversial subjects, Bada approaches each topic with his own brand of intelligent humor. Straightforward and unafraid to throw out a few profane words here and there, Bada delivers an honest message with each sentence that leaves listeners wanting to hear more.
BadaCast launched earlier this year and has delivered 20 installments of the According to Bada podcast. In his very first installment, Bada introduced himself and told listeners that many of his closest family members and friends had asked him why he wanted to launch a podcast. His response was simply that he wanted to launch a podcast, not just to help change other people’s lives, but to do something that truly fulfilled him.
Now, According to Bada is becoming widely popular. About his ambitions, Bada said that he is an “overly determined Brooklyn boy with the stereotypical New York accent and an old soul.” He said, “I’m 26, but I think like I’m 66.” Audiences are enjoying his to-the-point, no-holds-barred style that leaves no stone unturned.
Bada is excited to announce the launch of his highly anticipated first album. Luck And Laughs carries the spirit of the According to Bada podcast into an exciting full-length studio recorded album. The new album features the same wit and candor that is found in the podcast, offering a large serving of honesty and laughs for those who have the grit to handle it.
About his career in comedy thus far, Bada said, “One time I had a dream that I was lucky enough to succeed in this thing I really wanted to do, from time to time I wonder if I haven’t woken up yet.”
BadaCast is solely managed and operated by Bada, and through his company’s website, people can find links to the podcast series, merchandise, and the newly released album. Further information can be found at http://www.badacast.com .
About BadaCast
BadaCast is a comedy podcast launched by Bada. Listeners can hear a hardcore New Yorker’s perspective and honesty in each installment of the podcast, and Bada recently released Luck And Laughs , his first studio recorded comedy album.
